title: Berry Sweet
description: Berry Sweet is a playful, hand-painted pattern collection created for Valentine’s Day bows, baby apparel, and sweet childrens accessories. Featuring strawberries, tiny florals, ladybirds, and heart details, the collection blends charm and softness with a hint of whimsy. A warm palette of blush, berry red, soft lilac, and creamy neutrals makes the range ideal for seasonal drops, coordinated bow sets, rompers, dresses, and giftable accessories; designed to feel festive yet timeless.
